main.i_freetext: Gold Standard:A normal MRI T2* liver is >6.3 ms. Mild liver iron overload was defined by MRI T2* between 2.7 ms and 6.3 ms. Moderate liver iron overload was defined by MRI T2* between 1.4 ms and 2.7 ms. Severe liver iron overload was defined by MRI T2* <1.4 ms.
